ComicInfo.Title: The Dream Eater Saga Part 11
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: The Dream Eater Saga: Inferno
ComicInfo.Summary: Dream Eater Saga Part 11--Sela and Belinda journey to the underworld realm of the Inferno in search of the final missing piece of their plan to defeat the Dream Eater. But that piece happens to be the Dark One himself. Meanwhile, Mercy Dante is on a mission after the Dark One as well and cannot afford to let anything stand in her way. Part 11 of the event that will change everything is here!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-15 16:47:46. [CVDB294521]
ComicInfo.Characters: Belia, Belinda, Cindy Monroe, Mercy Dante, Sela Mathers, The Dark One
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Nei Ruffino (cover), Raven Gregory (writer), Stjepan Grimm Fairy Tales The Dream Eater Saga Inferno, f9718e277b598008af3d7b788125d4bc Anna’s Archive
